surrounding_lines:
<?php $__env->startSection('content'); ?>
<div class="map">
    <?php foreach($areas as $area): ?>

        <div class="<?php echo e($area->name); ?> area" style="<?php echo e($area->position); ?>">
            <form class="dropzone" id="upload<?php echo e($area->ID); ?>" action="<?php echo e(route('photoUpload')); ?>" method="post" style="width:100%;height:100%;">
                <?php echo csrf_field(); ?>

<?php $__env->startSection('content'); ?>
<div class="map">
    <?php foreach($areas as $area): ?>

        <div class="<?php echo e($area->name); ?> area" style="<?php echo e($area->position); ?>">
            <form class="dropzone" id="upload<?php echo e($area->ID); ?>" action="<?php echo e(route('photoUpload')); ?>" method="post" style="width:100%;height:100%;">
                <?php echo csrf_field(); ?>

params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan
